title._content: ["The Orchard," James Lawrence Breese house, 151 Hill Street, Southampton, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["The Orchard," James Lawrence Breese house, 151 Hill Street, Southampton, New York. Fountain] [1912] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: McKim, Mead & White, 1898-1907. Landscape: McKim, Mead & White, 1898-1907. Today: House, converted to Whitefield condominiums, is on the National Register of Historic Places. On slide (handwritten): "B" and "Breese, Jas. L, Southampton." Also, Johnston no. "2359." And gold star sticker. Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Published in Gardens for a Beautiful America / Sam Watters. New York: Acanthus Press, 2012. Plate 79. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16560 Call Number: LC-J717-X105- 22
